title: Robin Kinross
content:
Editor, [typographer](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922031931/http:/typophile.com/wiki/typographer), writer and critic. Founder of the publishing imprint [Hyphen Press](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922031931/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hyphen%20Press) in 1980. Kinross has contributed much to magazines, including Eye, Blueprint, Information Design Journal, and the Journal of Design History.

Hyphen Press now publishes a range of titles on typography and design, recent Hyphen Press publications include the second edition of Modern Typography (2004), The Stroke (2005), and Gerrit Noordzij's theory of writing.
